Lightning-smart PHP IDE

PhpStorm is a development tool for PHP and Web projects. Itâ€™s a perfect PHP IDE for working with Laravel, Symfony, Drupal, WordPress, and other frameworks.
PhpStorm 2024.2.3 is now available
PhpStorm 2024.2.3 is a minor update, and it includes a host of bug fixes and quality-of-life improvements.
Here are the most notable changes and bug fixes in this build:

- Fix: Duplicated action for Copy link to Space [IDEA-356169]
The full list of changes in PhpStorm 2024.2.3 is available in the release notes.
